proverbs: Use early game influence to attack
When no move looks good, tenuki.
Inside your territory make solid connection, facing out make tiger's mouth.
Hane at the head of two or three stones.
Cross-cut, Ko and life and death are the most significant parts of the game.
notes: Cross-cut, Ko, and life and death are the most significant parts of the game.
Make groups, not points, your focus (especially in middle game).
Avoid "puppy dog" go (always responding in area opponent plays).
